notifications._comment: Clean single-mode architecture with graceful fallbacks

_modes.voice_macos: macOS built-in TTS voices (daniel, samantha, alex)
_modes.voice_elevenlabs: ElevenLabs AI voices (WIP - requires API key)
_modes.voice_openai: OpenAI TTS voices (WIP - requires API key)
_modes.override: Single sound file for ALL notifications

_config_fields.soundpack: Non-voice sound pack name (default, classic, custom)
_config_fields.voice_macos: macOS voice name (daniel, samantha, alex, albert, zoe)
_config_fields.voice_elevenlabs: ElevenLabs voice ID (WIP - requires API setup)
_config_fields.voice_openai: OpenAI voice name (WIP - nova, alloy, echo, etc.)
_config_fields.override_sound_file: Single sound file for override mode (click.mp3, beep.wav, etc.)

notifications._fallback_chain: Each mode gracefully falls back to simpler modes if config missing or fails
